citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55-12:25 on April
5, 2022. Arrived at facility rang door bell, call listed phone and sent a text.
End Section
